column4: Can anyone help me with gnome-screensaver? Hardware acceleration seems to work fine in everything. fgl_gears works fine and fglrxinfo reports the correct ATI driver is working. The gnome-screensavers are very slow and choppy and I don't know why. There is no reason for this since I am using an ATI x1600 card with fast cpu and lots of RAM. I get the feeling that it is using software based rendering, like Mesa, for the screensavers. Run
How can you tell the fps with glxgears?
improper drivers are to blame. i've got nvidia, so i won't advice you anything, but all this is rather simple
type fglrxinfo in terminal and let us know what do you see there
